original_title: Gestatten, Bestatter - Der Insolvenzverwalter Fritz Westhelle
overview: A German documentary film from the year 2005 about the work of the Insolvenzverwalters Dr. Fritz Westhelle and the insolvency of the Autohaus Rößler in Nordhessen.
title: Gestatten, Bestatter - Der Insolvenzverwalter Fritz Westhelle
